text:
Nikhileshkumar Ikhar
Product development engineer with 7+ years of experience with
M.Tech. in IT. Successfully developed & deployed, platform & behaviour

startups.

Bengaluru, Karnataka - Email me on Indeed: indeed.com/r/Nikhileshkumar-Ikhar/
cb907948c3299ef4

Willing to relocate to: Hyderabad, Telangana - Mumbai, Maharashtra

WORK EXPERIENCE

Product Development

Aggrigator -  Bengaluru, Karnataka -

2015 to Present

Aggrigator is Stanford incubated startup. It is an agriculture-based online marketplace in US B2B
market.
First non-co-founding engineer to come on board reported directly to CTO.
Developed Reverse Auction Engine. A farmer would bid for their SKU and engine would pick
farmer based on bidding and capacity.
Developed Palletization engine. A pallet can have multiple SKU boxes from multiple buyers. The
engine generates a packing sequence of boxes in pallets in a truck container according to the
delivery route.
Developed prototype to categorize SKU with Deep learning.
Owned delivery of functionalities development, behavioural nudges, shaping of platform business
model, aligning of product development to business.
Architected, designed & deployed websites, database, UI/UX to facilitate farm fresh produce
procurement & delivery to end consumers. Owned and developed various features like, 
Inventory management plays a big role in optimizing cold storage, warehouse and trucking
requirement. It helped in reducing crop wastage.
Invoicing of sold crops and tracking payments.
Order tracking for buyer and seller.
Fetching USDA price list daily via a web crawler.
Generating various reports in online, CSV and PDF format.
Worked with technologies like Python, Django, Celery, MySQL, MongoDB, Ubuntu, Neural
Network.
First, six months employer was Above Solutions.

Software Engineer

Cisco -  Bengaluru, Karnataka -

2012 to 2015

Owned and developed several products to help network migration, upgradation, tracking bugs,
tracking
